original_title: テレワーク不倫 同僚に寝取られた若妻
overview: Tsumugi Akari works at a design office and they introduced teleworking. So Akari works from home and she begins to spend a lot of time video calling with her colleague Mr. Suzuki.  She just didn’t expect the guy was very rapey.  To make things worse Akari’s husband discovers the laptop where the streaming is still going on…
title: Telework Adultery This Young Wife Got Fucked By her Colleague – Tsumugi Akari
